name: Accel World Stage 01: Awakening of the Silver Wings
name_original: Accel World Stage 01: Awakening of the Silver Wings
description:
Accel World Stage 01: Awakening of the Silver Wings is a strategy game developed by Bandai. It came out on 13-09-2012.
Accel World Stage 01: Awakening of the Silver Wings is available on PSP and PlayStation 3.
